label: 佃
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Originally, the lands of an estate proprietor's personal demesne. A demesne of this kind was very small compared with the home farms" of European estate owners. By Kamakura times both azukari dokoro and jitō sometimes held tsukuda.　[預所、地頭]"
